PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-08572013-07-15,  PMO,  ,  , 
ActMinistries and Ministers of State Act
SubjectOrder Terminating the Assignment of the Honourable Tim Uppal and Assigning the Honourable Tim Uppal to Assist the Minister of Citizenship and Immigration
PrecisOrder a) terminating the assignment of the Honourable TIM UPPAL, made by Order in Council P.C. 2011-580 of May 18, 2011, and (b) assigning the Honourable TIM UPPAL, A MINISTER OF STATE TO BE STYLED MINISTER OF STATE (MULTICULTURALISM), to assist the Minister of Citizenship and Immigration, effective July 15, 2013.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2013-0078 Publication Date: 2013-07-31
AttachmentsAttachment
